column4: Does Wine X work under Unbuntu btw? I want to run Steam under there
So I can just use Ubuntu Desktop from the CD to see if I like it? (and learn something about linux)
the live cd is a bit slower then an installed system. but very useable.
theres other live linux cd's that may be a little better done.. but they are all fun toplay with.
Aight. And if I choose to install it, will Wine X work under it?

Skygge__,  you aont going to be doing much gaming/instaling from the live cd.. If you install the system - you can try. BUT really for the best in games for the hard-core-alcoholic-addicted gamer. i have to say stick with windows and dual boot.

,  you aont going to be doing much gaming/instaling from the live cd.. If you install the system - you can try. BUT really for the best in games for the hard-core-alcoholic-addicted gamer. i have to say stick with windows and dual boot.
The Steam Games/system just sort of ticked me off. :)
so running windows games under linux sucks donkey *****?
it all depends. and theres a LOT of things it depends on.  RUnning windows games under windows - is quickly becoming a HUGE hassle also.
